information.name: Florian Bigot
information.title: Full-Stack Developer & Engineer
information.subTitle: Python | Javascript | Django | Vue.js | Node.js | Docker
description: Mechanical Engineer by training, and self taught web developer. I like being challenged and solve problemms!

After a few succesfull year as a mechanical engineer I recently discover a new passion for coding. I learn everything myself using online ressources to solve everyday problems I face during my previous jobs.

I am now focusing on developing web application using modern javascript web framework (Vue 3 and Nuxt) and Python based REST API (Django). I also use Docker on a everyday basis to ease deployment and maintenance.
Feel free to email me if you want to chat

experiences.title: Product Development Engineer
experiences.description: Technology transfer of static and dynamic molded sealing solutions from France to the United-States.
tasks: Constructed web applications to organize, standardize and speed up early development phases for standard products (configurators, databases, work orders) using Python and JavaScript (Django and a Linux server)
Adapted and integrated global standard design for static and dynamic sealing solutions to US customers
Created CAE software to reduce cost and time of key product development using Python
Implemented additive manufacturing methods (FDM of TPE) to reduce cost and time for internal and prototype testing
Responsible for design, CAE validation and component sourcing for all non-standard new product development (SolidWorks, Hypermesh, and an internal CAE solver)

experiences.title: Project Manager
experiences.description: Project management of molded static sealing solutions from the quotation to the Start of Production (SOP)
tasks: Collaborated with the customer on all technical aspects of the project while engaging with the cross-functional teams
Managed multi-disciplinary teams’ activities across design, CAE, laboratory, prototype, industrialization, quality, and production

experiences.title: CAE Engineer intern
experiences.description: Performed CAE product validation and optimization of static sealing solutions
tasks: Executed and evaluated CAE tasks to optimize product functional requirement
Wrote a program to extract, analyze, and store data from multiple Excel files into a centralized database using VBA
Expanded and enriched a database used for CAE analysis through characterization of different material properties

experiences.title: Innovation Engineer intern
experiences.description: Patented and Optimized an inovative design for an hydro foil prototype for the racing yacht industry
tasks: Generated CAE model to study the impact of material and geometrical parameters on the crack resistance
Tested a 1/10th prototype to correlate and improve the CAE model
Applied innovative design principles to optimize the existing stack up to reduce crack propagations

experiences.title: R&D Technician intern
experiences.description: Assisted research on new composites materials
tasks: Fabricated samples and performed material characterization and testing according to different standard procedures
Analyzed results and consolidated findings into reports

educations.title: Self-learning Full-stack Development and Operation
educations.description: Learn various technology using online courses (Udemy), books and other ressources

educations.title: Msc in Mechanical Engineering
educations.description: Specialization in computed assisted engineering and material science. GPA: 3.78/4

educations.school: University Institute of Technology of Saint-Brieuc
educations.title: Bsc in Material Engineering
